text: United Party For National Development (UPND) is a political party in Zambia. It was the country's main opposition party until 2021, when the party president, businessman Hakainde Hichilema, was elected president.| Zambia opposition leader Hakainde Hichilema released BBC NewsTilyenji Kaunda returns to Zambia to continue dynasty. CNN.com - October 20, 2000 ==References== Category:Political parties in Zambia Category:1998 establishments in Africa Category:20th-century establishments in Zambia
title: United Party for National Development
